item.title: Harmony Energy Technologies Corp 10-K
item.description: Harmony Energy Technologies Corp, which is in the Miscellaneous Electrical Machinery, Equipment & Supplies [3690] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 04, 2022 had 15348 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 534 instances financial - 181 instances 31 - 158 instances december - 157 instances 2021 - 129 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
